text: Janusz Marian Majewski (5 August 1931 – 10 January 2024) was a Polish movie director and screenwriter. He directed over 40 movies from 1957 until 2015. Majewski died on 10 January 2024 at the age of 92. ==Movies== *1962: Szpital *1966: Sublokator *1970: Lokis *1972: System *1975: Zaklęte rewiry *1986: C.K. Dezerterzy *1998: Złoto dezerterów *2010: Mala matura 1947 *2015: Excentrycy, czyli po slonecznej stronie ulicy ==References== ==Other websites== * *Janusz Majewski at Culture.pl Category:1931 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Polish movie directors Category:Polish screenwriters Category:People from Lviv
title: Janusz Majewski (director)
